description: Sunrise temples, rice terraces, hidden waterfalls — a soundtrack to explore Bali’s most unforgettable gems.

items.name: Campuhan Ridge Walk - Central Highlands
items.description: On this trek, you will walk through various landscapes that highlight the central highland part of Ubud. It provided a pleasant escape from the congested streets of the towns and into the splendid greenery. You will trod on hidden trails and click amazing pictures of the scenery that encompasses the place; it's truly like surrendering oneself to nature. You don't have to worry about entry fees because it is free of cost and is open for all days of the week. This is one of the most popular Bali attractions.
items.location_hint: Kelusa, Payangan, Jl. Raya Campuhan, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

items.name: SkyDome Super Club - Best Nightlife
items.location_hint: Jln Legian No.61, Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

items.name: Mirror Bali Lounge And Club - For Friendly Excursions
items.description: This is a major party venue that is Gothic-themed and a destination that is hugely favoured by partygoers. As you enter the venue, you will find that the place is reminiscent of a Gothic cathedral with its high ceilings and stained Windows. Internationally famous DJ's, as well as local artists, set the house on fire. This place is perfect for those who want to have fun, get wild drinks and party like a rock star. It is open from about 11 pm to 4pm. This is another electrifying places to go in Bali.
items.location_hint: Jalan Petitenget No.106 Seminyak, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

items.name: Sundays Beach Club - In-house Party Spot
items.description: This is a popular beach club which has an in-house party spot as part of the Ungasan Clifftop Resort. The Sundays Beach Club is a small hut-like cabin with a detailed thatched roof and a beach setting. Here, people can spend the whole night either by going to the beach at night to experience the serenity of the lonesome waves or watching the early morning sunrise from there to enjoy the peacefulness of it all. As for drinks, the round bar is stocked full with it, and the club also has a kitchen, which operates on a first come, first served policy. Its really like a small paradise sitting right on the edge of the Ungasan Village. This is one of the most preferred places to visit in Bali for honeymoon.
items.location_hint: Jl. Pantai Sel. Gau Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80362, Indonesia

items.name: Rock Bar Bali - For Beer Lovers
items.location_hint: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

items.name: DAVA Steak And Seafood - Epicure’s Delight
items.location_hint: Sejahtera, AYANA Resort and Spa, BALI, Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

items.name: Yellow Flower Cafe - Delicious Coffees
items.description: Located right in the Penestanan hills, there is a cave shaped like a cafe. This Yellow Flower Cafe is run by an oval family and the surroundings there are enveloped in luscious greenery. Having breakfast here is just glorious. Take a seat here to taste some authentic Asian and Balinese food. The owners have grown their own vegetables to support local farming communities, so everything that they taste is fresh and healthy. The setup is eco-friendly with simple decor so visitors can experiment with its authenticity. This is a must-visit place to try out the Balinese Buffet every Sunday for dinner. Don't miss out on grabbing flavoursome delicacies at cafes in Penestanan while exploring Bali tourist spots.
items.location_hint: Jl. Raya Campuhan, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

items.name: Seasalt Seminyak - Scrumptious Delicacies
items.description: The amazing seafood over here, served with just a pinch of Japanese style and the wafting smell of the blue oceans, is enough to make anyone's heart sing. Sea salt is actually the very first stylish and modern residence in Seminyak that has experimented with seafood. Ge devour here is classy, the servings are well proportioned and the staff is hospitable. This is surely one of the must visit places in Bali. There is also a live kitchen, which makes people fall for sea salt. As you sit there to eat, enjoy the light and shadow play on the outer deck as the waves crash around. It's an enchanting place to be in. This place is open on all days of the week. Don't forget to check out awesome collections at markets in Seminyak.

items.name: Ubud Art Market - Shopaholics Delight
items.description: I love art and would like to have some very unique pieces in your abode then the place to look for it is the Ubud Art Market. The handmade crafts here are just exceptional. This is one of the best places to see in Bali. Stroll through this market as you look for amazing scarves, handmade woven baskets and bags, statues, kites, and other handcrafted goods. There are numerous awesome places near Ubud Art Market that make your day perfect!
items.location_hint: Jl. Raya Ubud No.35, Ubud, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

items.name: Sukawati Art Market - Regular Shopping Spot
items.location_hint: Jalan Raya Sukawati, Sukawati, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

items.name: Sanur Night Market - Balinese Meals
items.location_hint: Jl. Danau Tamblingan No.10, Sanur, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80228, Indonesia

items.name: Poppies Lane - Lively Walks
items.description: It is a top-rated shortcut road in Bali as it cuts down much of the distance for taxis, cars, surfboard scooters and more. There is Poppies Lane 1 and Poppies Lane 2, both of which come with amazing boutique resorts, hotels, restaurants and surf shops. In Lane 2, there's popular restaurants near Poppies Lane and art shops. The poppies Lane is one of the few happening places to visit in Bali which will give visitors the choice of the best hospitality chains. Bali is an amazing destination to head to because of the sheer variety of place to visit it offers its viewers. From beaches and temples to mountains and museums, there is everything here for the traveller. Moreover, all of it combined with the delicious and unique cuisine of the place makes it just the more attractive. This place is amongst the most loved Bali attractions.
items.location_hint: Kuta, Bali, Indonesia

items.name: Bali Swing – Lush Green Plantations
items.location_hint: Jl. Dewi Saraswati No.7, Bongkasa Pertiwi, Kec. Abiansemal, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80352, Indonesia

items.name: Pura Ulun Danu Bratan – Spiritual Encounters
items.location_hint: Danau Beratan, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

items.name: Sekumpul Waterfall – Peaceful Ambiance
items.description: Bali has many waterfalls, one of the most beautiful being the Sekumpul Waterfall, which is considered one of the top Bali destinations. Counted among the top 10 places to visit in Bali, it is a famous tourist spot where you must take a small hike to reach a cluster of seven beautiful falls. Admire this place's beauty and even dip in the cool, refreshing waters of the pond formed beneath the waterfalls. This is one of the best tourist spots in Bali, Indonesia.
items.location_hint: Bebetin, Sawan, Buleleng Regency, Bali, Indonesia

items.name: Garuda Wishnu – Religious Site
items.location_hint: Jl. Raya Uluwatu, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

items.name: Jatiluwih Green Land – Lush Green Rice Fields
items.location_hint: Tabanan Regency, Bali, Indonesia

items.name: METIS Bali – Fusion Dishes
items.description: If you wish to enjoy a fine dining experience with your spouse or whole family on your exotic vacation, then you should make reservations at METIS Bali. This is one of the best Bali, Indonesia, tourist spots. It is a highly acclaimed multi-cuisine restaurant where you will find French, Mediterranean, and fusion dishes to your liking. The airy restaurant has a lounge, bar, and private seating space where you can have an intimate dinner in the evening. It is among the top places to visit in Bali.
items.location_hint: METIS, Bali, Indonesia

items.name: Blue Point Beach – Exquisite Scenery
items.location_hint: Jl. Labuan Sait – Uluwatu, Pecatu, South Bali
